about_the_game:
“Remember it? Remember it! ” I can’t remember anything. Somebody keeps speaking to me: ”Where are you? Where are you? ” I need to go into my mind and find myself! I have come to this place named “The Third Building”. My memory is buried here. “The Third Building” is a first-person horror game. Play this “cursed” game to find the secrets about me and an indie-game studio in the third building.

Every college has a haunted building

This game is based on true stories from the producer. I hope I can tell my story. But after all game is not reality. The scariest thing is reality.

Me and My Team

We are F-Greetings Studio from UESTC, Chengdu, China. As a college student, I am clear that due to my limited experience there might be some mistakes and flows. And I develop this game by myself. As producer of this game, I accept criticism. I would appreciate it if you can give me some advice. You can contact me.

Contact


QQ group: 960671481

Weibo of the producer: Kyle_ZzZzZz

Bilibili account of producer: Kyle_ZzZzZ

Twitter: KyleZZZZhang

Thanks!!!

content_descriptors.notes: This is a horror game. It contains bad language, fear and violence. Some players might feel sick during the game.

detailed_description:
“Remember it? Remember it! ” I can’t remember anything. Somebody keeps speaking to me: ”Where are you? Where are you? ” I need to go into my mind and find myself! I have come to this place named “The Third Building”. My memory is buried here. “The Third Building” is a first-person horror game. Play this “cursed” game to find the secrets about me and an indie-game studio in the third building.

Every college has a haunted building

This game is based on true stories from the producer. I hope I can tell my story. But after all game is not reality. The scariest thing is reality.

Me and My Team

We are F-Greetings Studio from UESTC, Chengdu, China. As a college student, I am clear that due to my limited experience there might be some mistakes and flows. And I develop this game by myself. As producer of this game, I accept criticism. I would appreciate it if you can give me some advice. You can contact me.

Contact

name: The Third Building 三教 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170或AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 可兼容DX11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060或AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 可兼容DX11

short_description: “Remember it? Remember it! ” I can’t remember anything. Somebody keeps speaking to me: ”Where are you? Where are you? ” I need to go into my mind and find myself! I have come to this place named “The Third Building”. My memory is buried here.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support
